line_1: All playful as she sate, she grows demure;
line_2: O ruthful scene! when from a nook obscure,

line_1: THE gentle Pen with look demure,
line_2: Awhile was thought a virgin pure:

line_1: Observe each face, how sober and demure,
When thou becomest a cat demure,
line_2: And so, poor kit! must thou endure,
